name: Golf Training - Coaching Academy for PRO
name_original: Golf Training - Coaching Academy for PRO
description:
Learn GOLF differently.
Golf Training present the v1.0 of Golf training - Coaching Academy for PRO for the users of iPhone & iPad to learn the GOLF diffrenetly.
FEATURES :
* Video Training.
* Record you performance daily.
* Compare you daily peformance with PRO's.
* View your progress on weekly, monthly, yearly bases.

Beginners and professionals can practice these shots
* Tee Shot
* Fairway Shot
* Bunker Shot
* Flop Shot
* Chip Shot and much more.
Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and select a professional video and you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as a PRO Golfer.
Application contains HD videos that contains coaching and practice stuff for beginners as well.
Download and enjoy.
